ns0:foreignObject.html:div: Move one square in any direction, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 4. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card. Double the DC of the above check to move two squares in a straight line.
movement

Simple version: Move AGL/2 + 1 squares.
Correct version (stops some game-breaking problems with multiple square movement): Move one square in any direction. If this card was activated at more than 2 priority, move this card down the priority track by two spots. It may be activated again.
Return this card to your hand
movement

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square
Deal (1d4 - 2 + STR/2) damage.
Return this card to your hand

strike
unarmed
basic attack

Requires a dagger
Choose one of:
Deal (TEC/2 - 1 adv: 1d8 + STR/2) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square. Gain +2 PRI vs armor
Deal (TEC - 5 adv: 1d8 + STR/2, 1-3 on die means 0 dmg) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 4. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.
Return this card to your hand

strike
precise
basic attack

Simple version: Move AGL/2 + 1 squares.
Correct version (stops some game-breaking problems with multiple square movement): Move one square in any direction. If this card was activated at more than 2 priority, move this card down the priority track by two spots. It may be activated again.
Return this card to your hand
movement

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square
Deal (TEC/2 adv: 1d4 + STR/2 +1) damage.
Return this card to your hand

strike
unarmed
basic attack

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square
Your target rolls a DC MAX(STR, TEC) + EMP/2 STR or AGL + 1d8 check. If they fail, they move one square in any direction, your choice, and your strikes against them next tick have +2 damage. If they fail by 2 or more, you may also give them the 'prone' card.
Return this card to your hand

strike
unarmed
basic attack

Requires a dagger
Choose one of:
Deal (TEC adv: 1d8 + STR/2) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square. Gain +2 PRI vs armor
Deal (TEC -3 adv: 1d8 + STR/2, 1 on a die means 0 dmg) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 4. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.
Return this card to your hand

strike
precise
basic attack

Add +2 priority to another of your cards activated this tick.
Return this card to your hand

Add +4 to the priority against armor of another card you activate this tick
Return this card to your hand
modifier

Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Move one square toward the source of the attack. For the purposes of calculating the damage of that attack, subtract a total of your STR + TEC from whichever attributes of the attacker you see fit.
If you can set all of their relevant stats to 0, their card is cancelled, your attacker looses all their active AP, cannot refresh this tick, and, if you are in their square, you may move them to any adjacent square
Return this card to your hand
movement

Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Your weapon takes damage from the attack. If your weapon is destroyed, any leftover damage continues toward the original target
Return this card to your hand

Chose one of:
Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 5. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card.On a success, you may move a third space in the same direction.
Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies
movement

Chose one of:
Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 5. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card.On a success, you may move a third space in the same direction.
Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies
movement

Chose one of:
Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 5. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card.On a success, you may move a third space in the same direction.
Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies
movement

Target: One creature that has, this tick, moved to your square or a square you are currently adjacent to.
Continue their movement one extra square (or two if the one would mean they end up in your square). They immedately lose all AP they currently have in play, and all non-mental cards they currently have on the field are discarded. They cannot refresh their hand this tick. They gain the 'prone' status
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies

throw
strike

Target: Anyone within line of sight.
Look at one of their face-down cards.
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

Curiousity
Mental

Target: Anyone within line of sight.
Decrease the priority of one of their cards by 2. If you have previously used Anticiate Action on the card, decrease priority by 4
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

Curiousity
Mental

Simple version: Move AGL/2 + 1 squares.
Correct version (stops some game-breaking problems with multiple square movement): Move one square in any direction. If this card was activated at more than 2 priority, move this card down the priority track by two spots. It may be activated again.
Return this card to your hand
movement

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square
Deal (TEC/2 adv: 1d4 + STR/2 +0) damage.
Return this card to your hand

strike
unarmed
basic attack

Requires a longsword
Choose one of:
Deal TEC adv: 1d12 + STR/2 damage, targeting a line of three squares.
Deal TEC adv: 1d12 + STR/2 damage, targeting a cone of two squares.
Return this card to your hand

strike
basic attack

Add +4 to the priority against armor of another card you activate this tick
Return this card to your hand
modifier

Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Your weapon takes damage from the attack. If your weapon is destroyed, any leftover damage continues toward the original target
Return this card to your hand

Chose one of:
Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 5. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card..
Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies
movement
DR 5. Reduce your AGL by 3 - STR
Equipment

Chose any card currently in the queue for resolution that you are a valid target for. It now must target you.
Retrieval: 2 Fatigue

Attention
Mental

Target: Anyone with line of sight to you.
This tick, if they are targeting you with a card you do not wish to be targeted with, They must roll 1d6 + DISC vs 1d6 + CHARM + MAG/2. If they lose, their card is negated as though they had voluntarity discarded it
Retrieval: 3 Fatigue

Attention
Mental

Upkeep: 2
Target: Anyone within MAG
Increase or decrease your target's CHARM or DISC by 2
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

Attention
Mental

Simple version: Move AGL/2 + 1 squares.
Correct version (stops some game-breaking problems with multiple square movement): Move one square in any direction. If this card was activated at more than 2 priority, move this card down the priority track by two spots. It may be activated again.
Return this card to your hand
movement

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square
Deal (TEC/2 adv: 1d4 + STR/2 +0) damage.
Return this card to your hand

strike
unarmed
basic attack

Requires a dagger
Choose one of:
Deal (TEC/2 - 1 adv: 1d8 + STR/2) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square. Gain +2 PRI vs armor
Deal (TEC - 5 adv: 1d8 + STR/2, 1-3 on die means 0 dmg) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 4. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.
Return this card to your hand

strike
precise
basic attack

Requires a giant hammer
Choose one of:
Overhand Strike: Deal STRd6 damage to a square within reach two of you. Anyone within one square of that must test AGL with DC (STR - 3) * 2 or fall prone
Sweep Strike: Deal (STR/2)d4 damage, targeting a cone of two squares. Lose 2 PRI on all actions next tick.
Return this card to your hand

strike
basic attack

Add +1d6-2 priority to another of your cards activated this tick.
Return this card to your hand

Upkeep: 2
Target: Anyone within MAG.
Increase your target's STR, or decrease their AGL, EMP, or EXPR by 2.
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

Anger
Emote
Mental
Upkeep(MAG)

Upkeep: No cost, but anyone holding the dagger takes 1d4 - 2 damage
Create a cylindrical crystal the length and approximate shape of a tent spike. You may treat it as a dagger dealing 4d8 instead of 1d8 damage.
Retrieval: 2 Fatigue

Anger
Emote
Mental

Cover MAG + 1d4 squares with manifested anger crystals. The squares must be contiguous and start adjacent to you. For each affected square a creature is occupying, it takes 2d8 damage.
Any creature in one of the affected squares or adjacent to one of the affected squares takes 1d4 damage from radiant heat (and anything easily flammable nearbye will likely catch on fire) during the Upkeep phase. Using a movement card will break your connection with the anger. Direct (spike) damage does not affect you, but radiant damage does.
Retrieval: 3 Fatigue

Anger
Emote
Mental
Area

Momentarily create a small patch of anger crystals on your skin, right where a blow is about to strike you. Decrease the damage from a non-area attack targeting you by MAGd4. Take 1d6 - 4 damage. (The manifested anger burns you if you're too slow to remove it and is sometimes in uncomfortable places).
Return this card to your hand

Anger
Emote
Mental

Upkeep: D*2 (D = 0 if you are fine, +1 for each state you are down)
Take no negative effects from damage or fatigue. You may not use any non-Anger 'Mental' card
Retrieval: 4 Fatigue

Trance
Anger
Emote
Mental
Upkeep(MAG)

Simple version: Move AGL/2 + 1 squares.
Correct version (stops some game-breaking problems with multiple square movement): Move one square in any direction. If this card was activated at more than 2 priority, move this card down the priority track by two spots. It may be activated again.
Return this card to your hand
movement

Chose one of:
Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 5. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card..
Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies
movement

Target: One forward square
Deal 1d4 + STR - 1 damage. If you deal damage, you can latch on to your target. Gain the 'latched on' effect, while your target gains the 'chomped' effect

strike
unarmed

Simple version: Move AGL/2 + 1 squares.
Correct version (stops some game-breaking problems with multiple square movement): Move one square in any direction. If this card was activated at more than 2 priority, move this card down the priority track by two spots. It may be activated again.
Return this card to your hand
movement

Chose one of:
Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 5. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card..
Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue for all copies
movement
DR 6. On any tick you use 'Chomp', reduce the PRI of this card to +0

Target: One forward square
Deal 1d4 + STR - 1 damage. If you deal damage, you can latch on to your target. Gain the 'latched on' effect, while your target gains the 'chomped' effect

strike
unarmed

Target: One entity which you latched on to and have at least 8 bid tokens on
Deal STRd4 damage. Heal half the damage you dealt. If that would put you over maximum, gain 1/10th of the additional as permanent extra HP. Do not round -- extra bits add up over uses of this card

strike
unarmed
hunger

Simple version: Move AGL/2 + 1 squares.
Correct version (stops some game-breaking problems with multiple square movement): Move one square in any direction. If this card was activated at more than 2 priority, move this card down the priority track by two spots. It may be activated again.
Return this card to your hand

Deal 1d4 + STR - 1 damage. If you deal damage, you can latch on to your target. Gain the 'latched on' effect, while your target gains the 'chomped' effect

unarmed

Target: One entity which you latched on to and have at least 8 bid tokens on
Deal STRd4 damage. Heal half the damage you dealt. If that would put you over maximum, gain 1/10th of the additional as permanent extra HP. Do not round -- extra bits add up over uses of this card

strike
unarmed
hunger
Create 1d4 Minor Hunger Spirits adjancent to you.
nurture
Take 8 damage. Turn one Minor Hunger Spirit within your reach into a Medium Hunger Spirit

nurture
hunger

Requires a dagger

Deal (TEC adv: 1d8 + STR/2) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square. Gain +2 PRI vs armor
Deal (TEC -3 adv: 1d8 + STR/2, 1 on a die means 0 dmg) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 4. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.

Chose one of:
Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 5. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card.On a success, you may move a third space in the same direction.
Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.

movement

Target: Anyone within line of sight.
Bid MAG on this card. When you have 6 bid tokens on this card, you may look at your target's hand.
Retrieval: 2 Fatigue

Curiousity
Mental

Upkeep: 2
Target: Anyone within MAG.
Increase your target's PRI on all cards by 1, or their KNOWLEDGE by 2
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

Curiousity
Mental

Upkeep: No cost, but anyone holding the dagger takes 1d4 - 2 damage
Create a cylindrical crystal the length and approximate shape of a tent spike. You may treat it as a dagger dealing 4d8 instead of 1d8 damage.
Retrieval: 2 Fatigue

Anger
Emote
Mental

Momentarily create a small patch of anger crystals on your skin, right where a blow is about to strike you. Decrease the damage from a non-area attack targeting you by MAGd4. Take 1d6 - 4 damage. (The manifested anger burns you if you're too slow to remove it and is sometimes in uncomfortable places).
Return this card to your hand

Anger
Emote
Mental

You may not use 'movement' cards that do not also have the 'prone' tag.
Can be removed by spending 2 AP
status

Bid STR
As long as this card is in effect, cannot use any 'movement' cards. This card may be turned into 'Grappling' if you have at least one bid token on it
status

Bid STR
As long as this card is in effect, any 'movement' cards you use have 0 combo and affect both you and the person you are grappling. If you have at least one bid token on this card, you may chose to only affect yourself with movement cards. If you leave the square of the person you are grappling, discard this card.
You may turn this card's partner from 'Grappling' into 'Grappled' if you have at least your enemy's STR bid tokens on this card.
You may turn this card's partner from 'Grappled' into 'Pinned' if you have at least 2x your enemy's STR bid tokens on this card
status

Bid STR
As long as this card is in effect, cannot use any 'movement' or 'strike' cards. Your STR and TEC count as one lower for the purposes of bidding on this card. This card may be turned into 'Grappling' if you have at least one bid token on it
status

Bid STR + 2
As long as this card is in effect, you may not use any 'movement' or 'strike' cards. You may voluntarily discard this card by paying 1 AP with priority TEC + 4. This card is discarded if its paired 'Chomped' card is discarded
status

Bid STR
As long as this card is in effect, all 'movement' cards take + 1 AP, and apply to both you and the creature that has chomped you. All 'strike' cards have -1 priority. Each time you activate a 'movement' or 'strike' card, take 1d4-1 damage. Can be removed if you have at least one bid token on this card.
status
